title: 新版的gamerule里面的指令哪两个是防止生物爆炸和死亡不掉落
author: 刘小玄

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
gamerule keepInventory true

gamerule mobGriefing false

replies.author: 黑茶RGO
replies.txt_content:
这俩一直没变过
防爆：gamerule mobGriefing false
死亡不掉落：gamerule keepInventory true

replies.author: super逍遥
replies.txt_content:
死亡不掉落：gamerule keepInventory true

防爆炸：gamerule mobGriefing false

/gamerule keepInventory ture死亡不掉落
/gamerule mobGriefing flase防爆
但是mobGriefing是生物是否能改变方块(破坏,防止),所以也会让末影人无法拿起方块,僵尸无法破坏海龟蛋

replies.author: QingTFH2
replies.txt_content:
防爆：gamerule mobGriefing 
死亡不掉落：gamerule keepInventory 
这里比较建议你百度

replies.author: a1320
replies.txt_content:
keepinventory是死亡不掉
mobgriefing是不爆炸
都改成true就行

replies.author: lxh0916
replies.txt_content:
/gamerule mobGriefing false  防爆
/gamerule keepInventory true  死亡不掉落

replies.author: 流年之间
replies.txt_content: 死亡不掉落gamerule keepInventory true  防爆 gamerule mobGriefing false

replies.author: 寒暄Han_xuan
replies.txt_content: 死亡不掉落/gamerule keepInventory true  防爆/gamerule mobGriefing false

replies.author: iyikvi
replies.txt_content:
/gamerule keepInventory true死亡不掉落
/gamerule mobGriefing false防爆

replies.author: Handsomezhu
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: JianshengQ
replies.txt_content:
死亡不掉落：/gamerule keepInventory true

防爆炸：/gamerule mobGriefing false
